Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<User>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Patron

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<User>
    The abstract class user creates the base functionality for creating users to interact with the library system.
    Author:
    Marcus

    • Method Detail

      • verifyPassword

        public boolean verifyPassword(java.lang.String password)
        The verify password method checks the hash code to see if the parameter matches the password (stored as a hash code of the password String.)
        Parameters:
        password - a password to verify
        Returns:
        true if the parameter matches the password and false otherwise

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(User other)
        The compare to method looks at two users to see if they are in order. It performs a lexicographical comparison.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<User>
        Parameters:
        other - an other user to compare
        Returns:
        an integer value obtained via lexicographical comparison
